GSD.product_version: versions from v4.5 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
watchdog: ts4800_wdt: Fix refcount leak in ts4800_wdt_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 5b110d940417942bc87d9e4bea6d4f24e05ed483, it was introduced in version v4.5 by commit bf9006399939762e6cd32445e848e56727df9d98. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: watchdog: ts4800_wdt: Fix refcount leak in ts4800_wdt_probe
